news.title: Feds ask Waymo about robotaxis repeatedly passing school buses in Austin

news.title: Micro1, a Scale AI competitor, touts crossing $100M ARR
news.summary: Micro1 started the year with roughly $7 million ARR. Now, it claims to have surpassed $100 million in ARR, double what it reported in September.

news.title: Apple’s executive shake-up continues with departures of general counsel and policy head
news.summary: Apple loses two more top senior executives with exits of longtime general counsel Kate Adams and environmental VP Lisa Jackson. Meta’s Jennifer Newstead is set to join as new general counsel in 2026.
